=== Current Position ===
(Left is decreasing x, Right is increasing x, Up is decreasing y, Down is increasing y)
(row = 7, col = 11)
=== Last Position ===
(row = 7, col = 11)

Given that the avatar's position has not changed from the last state, it indicates that any directional action last taken resulted in a rotation instead of movement. 

To proceed, since the avatar is currently at (row = 7, col = 11) and it's facing towards the right, the next logical action is to attempt to move the avatar to the right once again.

Looking at the current map, moving right to (row = 7, col = 12) is blocked by a boulder ('@'), and thus movement in that direction is not possible. The next reasonable actions are either moving up (to (row = 6, col = 11), which is clear) or down (to (row = 8, col = 11), which is also clear). 

Based on exploration strategies and resource collection goals, I will choose the upward movement, as it keeps options open in subsequent turns.

``` Action: 5 ```  

This action will allow exploration of the upper area while conserving resources and steering clear of immediate threats. I'm expecting this to lead to further useful actions in the next turns.
